name: Dragon Rainbow Wildfire
description:
Fly a fire breathing dragon.  Destroy huts and whirlygigs.  Feed off the bison and geese.

19 levels.

Controls:

keys mouse and right mouse button control the dragon.

holding the left mouse key breathes fire.  The red meter needs to be recharged between breaths.

key when held picks up bison, geese, and meat.  Press the key again to drop the entity being carried.

key consumes meat being carried.  This adds to overall health, the blue meter.

key creates a visible trail to the closest entity.

key skips to the next level.

ape key goes to the main menu level/screen.

On the main menu screen you will be prompted for a level number you wish to play... like the pages of a book, with the page number starting at 651.  It is optional since you can mouse click on play game/continue/quit instead.
